resources.string: All permissions must be granted to continue
Do you want to exit the app?
No internet connection.\nTo continue, connect to the internet and try again.
Hello! I am Smart Blocker. I will be your assistant in blocking unwanted calls and my smart filters will help me with this.
Smart filters will analyze incoming calls based on criteria you specify and block or permit them.
I\'m always available to help you understand how I work. To do this, find the icon and follow it to the screen with the instruction.
The phone will ask for the necessary permissions to work properly. To do this, select “Allow” in the system windows.
Enter your email, and we will send you instructions.
An email has been sent to your Email. Check in your inbox.
There is no user with this email address. Go to the sign up screen and create an account.
A user with this email already exists. Go to the login screen and log in.
An unauthorized user has data stored locally within a single session. Enter anyway?
No internet connection.\nTo continue, connect to the internet and log in again.
Create filter %1$s with type Blocker and attribute %2$s?
Filter %1$s with type Blocker and attribute %2$s has been created!
Create filter %1$s with type Permission and attribute %2$s?
Filter %1$s with type Permission and attribute %2$s has been created!
Do you want to change filter type %s to Blocker?

Filter - a number created by the user in the Smart Blocker application that analyzes the incoming Call and controls it if it matches in the specified area.

According to the nature of call control, filters are divided into two types:

Blocker - block an incoming call;

Permission - permits an incoming call;

According to the area of match with an incoming call, they are divided to three criteria:

Full number - full match with incoming call;
Example: Incoming call +380502711344 matches filter +380502711344 ;

Starting - match on the start of an incoming call;
Example: Incoming call +380502711344 matches the filter +380502;

Contains - matches anywhere in the incoming call.
Example: The incoming call +380502711344 matches the filter 2711344;

If the number matches other filters, the Priority rule takes effect.

Blocker - a filter created by the user in the Smart Blocker app to block incoming Calls of the phone.

For each Blocker, information is available: filter number, control type, match area, creation time, contact matches.

Example :

Permission - a filter created by the user in the Smart Blocker application to permit incoming Calls of the phone, even if the number has matches with the blocker.

For each Permission, information is available: filter number, control type, match area, creation time, contacts matches.

Example:

Call - connection between telephone subscribers using telephone numbers.

For each Call, information is available: avatar, number, name, number validity (hidden by default), time, call type, filter attribute.

Example:


In the Smart Blocker application, calls are divided into:

Standard:
Outgoing;
Incoming;
Missed;
Rejected;

Filtered:
Incoming(permitted by filter);
Passed(permitted by filter);
Rejected(permitted by filter );
Blocked by filter or Smart Blocker app settings;

Contact - an entry containing information about a person or organization that is stored in the address book of your phone or account.

For each Contact, information is available: avatar, number, name, filter match.

Example:

A screen with a list of created Filters of type Blocker, sorted by creation date.

Clicking on any list filter will take you to the Blocker screen with filter details.

Clicking the button opens a submenu with attributes by matched area. Selecting will take you to the appropriate screen Blocker Creation(Full Number), Blocker Creation(Starts) or Blocker Creation(Contains).

If the list is not empty become available:

Filtering the list by attribute
Filtering by match area: Full number, Begins, Contains.

Search by number
Search by number is performed.

Delete filter
Activated by long pressing on any filter in the list. Single and list delete available.

A screen with detailed information about the created Blocker.

In addition to general information about the filter, it has additional information number of related contacts and calls with full list to each:
List of contacts that have full or partial(more Incomplete numbers) filter match;
List of calls from the log that were blocked by this filter.

Two operations with Blocker are available:
Delete - deletes the filter.
Button Change - changes the filter type to Permission.

Blocker creation screen with matching area Full number >.

On the screen are available:

Details of the creating filter. The following information is displayed: number, filter type, matching area, information about available actions with the created filter.

Country code. Phone number country information with phone code display. When pressed, a window for changing the code is called up with a list of suggested countries.

Number input field. Contains a mask according to the number format of the selected country. Contains # characters to be replaced by numbers (the number of # characters corresponds to the number of characters of the national number of the selected country) and other characters according to the mask.

Action button. It varies depending on the creating filter. It can take 4 states:
Create(inactive) - if the number is incomplete or invalid for this country.
Create(active) - if the number is valid, on click, a new filter is created.
Delete - if a filter with this type already exists. This filter is deleted when clicked.
Change - if the filter exists, but with the type Permission. On click, this filter changes its type to Blocker.

List of matches. List of contacts that have a full or partial match with the filter (more info Incomplete numbers)

Blocker creation screen with matching area Begins >.

On the screen are available:

Details of the creating filter. The following information is displayed: number, filter type, matching area, information about available actions with the created filter.

Country code. Phone number country information with phone code display. When pressed, a window for changing the code is called up with a list of suggested countries.

Number input field. Contains a mask in the format of the number of characters of the national number of the selected country minus one with # characters to replace with numbers.

Action button. It varies depending on the creating filter. It can take 3 states:
Create(active) - a new filter is created on click.
Delete - if the filter with this type is already exists. This filter is deleted when clicked.
Change - if the filter exists, but with the type Permission. On click, this filter changes its type to Blocker.

List of hits. List of contacts that have a full or partial match with the filter (more info Incomplete numbers)

Blocker creation screen with matching area Contains.

On the screen are available:

Details of the creating filter. Information is displayed: number, filter type, matching area, information about available actions with the created filter.

Number input field. Does not contain a mask and has no limit on the number of characters entered.

Action button. It varies depending on the creating filter. It can take 4 states:
Create(inactive) - if the number is empty.
Create(active) - if the number has at least one digit, a new filter is created on click .
Delete - if a filter with this type already exists. This filter is deleted when clicked.
Change - if the filter exists, but with the type Permission. On click, this filter changes its type to Blocker.

List of hits. List of contacts that have a full or partial match with the filter (more info Incomplete numbers)

A screen with a list of created Filters of type Permission, sorted by creation date.

Clicking on any list filter will take you to the Permission screen with filter details.

Clicking the button opens a submenu with attributes by matched area. Selecting takes you to the appropriate screen Create Permission(Full Number), Create Permission(Starts) or Create Permission(Contains).

If the list is not empty become available:

Filtering the list by attribute
Filtering by match area: Full number, Begins, Contains.

Search by number
Search by number is performed.

Delete filter
Activated by long pressing on any filter in the list. Single and list delete available.

Screen with detailed information about the created Permissions.

In addition to general information about the filter, it has additional information the number of related contacts and calls with a full list to each:
List of contacts that have full or partial (more Incomplete numbers) filter match;
List of calls from the log that were permitted by this filter.

Two permission operations are available:
Button Delete - completely removes the filter.
Button Change - changes the filter type to Blocker.

Creating Screen Permissions with matching area Full Number b>.

On the screen are available:

Details of the creating filter. The following information is displayed: number, filter type, matching area, information about available actions with the created filter.

Country code. Phone number country information with phone code display. When pressed, a window for changing the code is called up with a list of suggested countries.

Number input field. Contains a mask according to the number format of the selected country. Contains # characters to be replaced by numbers (the number of # characters corresponds to the number of characters of the national number of the selected country) and other characters according to the mask.

Action button. It varies depending on the creating filter. It can take 4 states:
Create(inactive) - if the number is incomplete or invalid for this country.
Create(active) - if the number is valid, on click, a new filter is created.
Delete - if a filter with this type already exists. This filter is deleted when clicked.
Change - if the filter exists, but with the type Blocker. On click, this filter changes its type to Permission.

List of hits. List of contacts that have a full or partial match with the filter (more info Incomplete numbers)

Creation Screen Permissions with matching area Begins.

On the screen are available:

Details of the creating filter. The following information is displayed: number, filter type, matching area, information about available actions with the created filter.

Country code. Phone number country information with phone code display. When pressed, a window for changing the code is called up with a list of suggested countries.

Number input field. Contains a mask in the format of the number of characters of the national number of the selected country minus one with # characters to replace with numbers.

Action button. It varies depending on the creating filter. It can take 3 states:
Create(active) - a new filter is created on click.
Delete - if the filter with this type is already exists. This filter is deleted when clicked.
Change - if the filter exists, but with the type Blocker. On click, this filter changes its type to Permission.

List of hits. List of contacts that have a full or partial match with the filter (more info Incomplete numbers)

Creating screen Permissions with matching area Contains >.

On the screen are available:

Details of the creating filter. Information is displayed: number, filter type, matching area, information about available actions with the created filter.

Number input field. Does not contain a mask and has no limit on the number of characters entered.

Action button. It varies depending on the creating filter. It can take 4 states:
Create(inactive) - if the number is empty.
Create(active) - if the number has at least one digit, a new filter is created on click .
Delete - if a filter with this type already exists. This filter is deleted when clicked.
Change - if the filter exists, but with the type Blocker. On click, this filter changes its type to Permission.

List of hits. List of contacts that have a full or partial match with the filter (more info Incomplete numbers)

Screen with a list of Calls of the phone sorted and grouped by date.

Clicking on any call in the list will take you to the Number screen with details of the call number.

If the list is not empty, become available :

Filtering the list by attribute
Filtering by filter match history: Blocked by filter, Permitted by filter.

Search by number
Searches by phone number and name.

Call deletion
Deletion is only available for filtered calls. The blocked call is completely removed from the list and history. The permitted call remains in the list, but without a filtering sign. Activated by long pressing on a filtered call. Single and list delete available.

Screen with list of Contacts sorted and grouped by contact name.

When clicked any contact in the list will go to the Number screen with details of the contact number.

If the list is not empty, the following are available:

Filtering the list by attribute
Filtering by filter match: With blocker attribute, With permission attribute.

Search by number
Searches by number and contact name.

Screen with detailed information about the number. The number can be taken from the list Contacts or from the list Call.

General information is displayed: avatar, number, name, validity (hidden by default).

There is additional information on the number:
List of filters that have matches with this filter, arranged according to Priority rules.
List of calls to this number that have been filtered out.

Two operations are available with the number:
Button Create - takes the number to the Create blocker screen. Before switching, you must select a sign by the area of coincidence: Full number, Begins, Contains.
Button Create - transfers the number to the Create permission screen. Before moving on, you need to select a feature by the area of coincidence: Full number, Begins, Contains.

If the number is hidden, only:
Button Settings - takes you to the settings screen, where you can enable or disable the option to block hidden numbers.

To the number that has matches with more than one filter will be applied a filter that will match the criterion:
* which has more characters in the number
If the number of characters matches then the second criterion:
* which has a lower match start index in the number

Example for the number +380502711344.

List of filters (in order of priority from high to low):
1. Full number +380502711344 match: +380502711344 (13 characters, index - 0)
2. Starting +38050 match: +380502711344 (6 chars, index 0)
3. Contains 711344 match: +380502711344 (6 characters, index - 6)
4. Starting +3805 match: +380502711344 (5 chars, index 0)
5. Contains 7113 match: +380502711344 (4 characters, index - 6)
6. Contains 1344 match: +380502711344 (4 characters, index - 9)

Incomplete number – a number from the list Contacts or from the list Call that has a deviation from the standard format for an incoming call: “+country code” “national number”.
Example of a full number: Contact +380502711344.

Deviations include one or both of the following:
1. The presence of non–numeric characters(except for the “+” sign at the beginning): space, brackets, hyphen, etc.
Example: Contact +38 (050) 271–13–44.
To correctly compare the number with the filter, Smart Blocker will remove all non–numeric characters.Number Contact +38 (050) 271–13–44 will be converted at +380502711344.

2. Missing country code.
Example Contact 0502711344.
To correctly compare the number with a filter like Full number or Starting Smart Blocker will take the country code of the filter, add it to the number, and if such a number is valid, it will compare.
Blocker Starts +38050 will match Contact 0502711344: +38 and 0502711344 – valid number: +380502711344 .

When creating a filter, such numbers will be included in the filtered list and will have the format: “country code?” “partial number”.
Example Contact +380? (050) 271–13–44.
No numbers found with these parameters
No filter matches found for this number
No number matches found for this filter
No filtered calls found with these parameters
Hidden numbers are managed by system settings. To change go to "Settings"

Your data is stored locally within a single session and will be lost if you log out of this account, clear the cache, or reinstall the application. To connect remote data storage and access it from any device, register.
Only filtered calls can be deleted

plurals.item: Delete the filtered call %s from the log?

resources.string: Smart Blocker will manage incoming calls according to your filters
Smart Blocker will not manage incoming calls according to your filters
Smart Blocker will block hidden numbers
Smart Blocker will not block hidden numbers
This information is needed for Smart Blocker to substitute the country code in incomplete numbers. To change, click on the flag of the country.
Are you sure you want to log out?
If you log out of an unauthorized account, you will lose all created data. Sign up to save. Still leave?
The account and all created data will be permanently deleted. Enter your current password to continue.
The account and all created data will be permanently deleted. Google may ask you to confirm your authorization to continue..
The created data will be transferred to your account.
The created data will be deleted.
If you have any suggestions or comments, please describe them below

Privacy Policy

Tarasov Volodymyr built the SmartBlocker app as a Commercial app. This SERVICE is provided by Tarasov Volodymyr and is intended for use as is.

This page is used to inform visitors regarding my policies with the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Information if anyone decided to use my Service.

If you choose to use my Service, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy. The Personal Information that I collect is used for providing and improving the Service. I will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy.

The terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions, which are accessible at SmartBlocker unless otherwise defined in this Privacy Policy.

Information Collection and Use

For a better experience, while using our Service, I may require you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information. The information that I request will be retained on your device and is not collected by me in any way.

The app does use third–party services that may collect information used to identify you.

Link to the privacy policy of third–party service providers used by the app

  • Google Play Services
  • AdMob
  • Google Analytics for Firebase
  • Firebase Crashlytics

Log Data

I want to inform you that whenever you use my Service, in a case of an error in the app I collect data and information (through third–party products) on your phone called Log Data. This Log Data may include information such as your device Internet Protocol (“IP”) address, device name, operating system version, the configuration of the app when utilizing my Service, the time and date of your use of the Service, and other statistics.

Cookies

Cookies are files with a small amount of data that are commonly used as anonymous unique identifiers. These are sent to your browser from the websites that you visit and are stored on your device\'s internal memory.

This Service does not use these “cookies” explicitly. However, the app may use third\–party code and libraries that use “cookies” to collect information and improve their services. You have the option to either accept or refuse these cookies and know when a cookie is being sent to your device. If you choose to refuse our cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of this Service.

Service Providers

I may employ third\–party companies and individuals due to the following reasons:

  • To facilitate our Service;
  • To provide the Service on our behalf;
  • To perform Service–related services; or
  • To assist us in analyzing how our Service is used.

I want to inform users of this Service that these third parties have access to their Personal Information. The reason is to perform the tasks assigned to them on our behalf. However, they are obligated not to disclose or use the information for any other purpose.

Security

I value your trust in providing us your Personal Information, thus we are striving to use commercially acceptable means of protecting it. But remember that no method of transmission over the internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure and reliable, and I cannot guarantee its absolute security.

Links to Other Sites

This Service may contain links to other sites. If you click on a third–party link, you will be directed to that site. Note that these external sites are not operated by me. Therefore, I strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of these websites. I have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third–party sites or services.

Children\’s Privacy

These Services do not address anyone under the age of 13. I do not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from children under 13 years of age. In the case I discover that a child under 13 has provided me with personal information, I immediately delete this from our servers. If you are a parent or guardian and you are aware that your child has provided us with personal information, please contact me so that I will be able to do the necessary actions.

Changes to This Privacy Policy

I may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. Thus, you are advised to review this page periodically for any changes. I will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.

This policy is effective as of 2023–01–04

Contact Us

If you have any questions or suggestions about my Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact me at blockersmart2022@gmail.com.
